==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|lit=emperor star}}

===Etymology===
It is located in the middle of the constellation known as {{w|Purple Forbidden enclosure}}, which resembles an imperial palace. Consequently, many of the stars were named for the person or building that might have been located in a given part of the palace.
